title: @iwmwn/release Config
description: Configuration file for the @iwmywn/release CLI tool.

token.description: Your GitHub token used for authentication.

projectRoot.description: The root directory of your project.

commitTypes.description: List of allowed commit types for changelog generation. Defaults to ["feat", "fix", "docs", "refactor", "perf", "test", "build", "ci", "style", "chore"].

changeLog.description: The filename of your changelog. Default is 'CHANGELOG.md'.

titles.description:
Custom titles for different commit types in the changelog. Defaults to:
"feat": "Features",
"impr": "Improvements",
"fix": "Fixes".

^[a-zA-Z]+$.description: A custom section title for this commit type.
